title: Samsung reveals upgraded Family Hub smart fridge complete with Bixby
description:
![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

**If you’re in the market for a refrigerator that can do a little more than
just keep your food and beers cold, Samsung has your back with the latest
version of its tech-packed Family Hub smart fridge.**

The firm took the wraps off its new Family Hub refrigerator at [CES
2018](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/ces-2018-live-news-
highlights-3350586)– and it bundles a number of exciting features, including
the firm’s in-house Bixby digital assistant and a 21.5-inch LED touchscreen.

No, we aren’t kidding. You can actually instruct the fridge to complete a slew
of remedial tasks, like compiling a shopping list, reading out your schedule
and even playing music through the integrated AKG speakers.

![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

**Image: Samsung**

What’s more, the Family Hub – as indicated by its name – was designed to act
as the centrepiece of an IoT household, letting you control your home’s
heating, lighting and security cameras with its massive touchscreen – provided
your IoT household is powered by Samsung’s SmartThings platform, of course.

**Related:[Best fridge freezers](https://www.trustedreviews.com/guide/best-
fridge-freezer)**

Finally, the unit sports an internal camera, so you can keep an eye on your
precious King Edward spuds – or check to see what ingredients you need to
stock up on for dinner – while you’re at the office. How often you’ll actually
use this feature remains to be seen, though.
